channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Frank Usher
channel.desc: Discover elegant clothing and accessories from Frank Usher. Designed for the modern woman, these beautiful designs will add a touch of sparkle and glamour to your wardrobe with comfort in mind.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Get it or Regret it
channel.desc: Snap up the best offers at QVC before they're gone! We've got great savings on fashion, beauty, home and more, including items that won't be around for long.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home
channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: 30 Years with Butler & Wilson
channel.desc: Celebrate 30 sparkling years of Butler & Wilson jewellery, renowned for radiant crystal pieces that will turn heads whenever you wear them. Find your fabulous right here at QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Percy and Reed Haircare
channel.desc: Percy and Reed brings you new haircare products you always needed but could never find and they only create products which work - bringing British individuality and their own style to your hair.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Australian Bodycare
channel.desc: This Australian Bodycare range is inspired by the ancient traditions of the Aborigines who discovered the effects of natural ingredients. Find cleansing and caring products for your skin.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Routines
channel.desc: Your daily ritual just got a serious update with these beauty routines from top brands. From the best in bodycare to skincare essentials, these daily rituals will help bring out the beauty in you.

channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Morning Style
channel.desc: Every Wednesday at 11am here on QVC Style we'll be offering hints, tips and advice on looking your best, along with another look at fabulous fashion from the Morning Style show with Kathy.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Supplement your Health
channel.desc: In this show we'll bring you a range of vitamins, minerals, health foods and other nutritional supplements, plus great tips and advice on how to reach your optimum health.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Diamonique Jewellery
channel.desc: Showcasing a wide range of beautiful Diamonique designs in both silver and gold, this show offers an emporium of both the classic and essential looks plus unusual rare cuts and sparkling colours.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Discover Beauty
channel.desc: Want to treat your tresses, take care of your complexion or make-over your make-up bag? Tune in for an hour of gorgeous skincare, cosmetics and pampering body treats from the biggest names in beauty.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Izabel London Fashion
